summary:
In vanilla all Housecarls have boring steel plate armor and no perks to enhance their combat skills. Also their max level is capped at 50. This mod changes all of that.

This is my first mod, I made it for myself then decided to upload it because why not.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description:[/b][/u] All housecarls are equipped with new armor and weapons. Perks are added where they made sense.
For Example Rayya of Falkreath now has Dual Flurry perk and Argis of Markarth is equipped with Dwarven Armor and Sword.
Max level cap is at 81.

[u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u] Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.
[u][b]
Game balance/Immersion friendly[/b][/u]: 2 Housecarls have Nordic Carved Armor. I see Bandits roaming around with them all the time so I don't think it's too OP or game breaking.

There is only one OP Armor though which is given to Jordis. [b]There is another version without it[/b]. So you can use that.
The only reason I did it is because it really looked good on her. Seriously that's the only reason.

[u][b]Compatibility: [/b][/u]I am using this mod with [u]Extensible Follower Framework v4-0-2[/u] and have no issues. If you are using any follower overhaul mod just load this mod after that. It just edits armor and weapons so I don't think there will be any issues.
author: User_47917238
